alert.note: Alert for Rock (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 8:30PM CDT until June 20 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Rock County in southwestern Minnesota... Southeastern Minnehaha County in southeastern South Dakota... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 829 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Garretson to near Corson to near Sioux Falls, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Valley Springs around 845 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Beaver Creek, Luverne, Hardwick and Blue Mounds State Park. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
